snippet: Berlin’s new airport is attracting tourists after a series of delays and bungles have driven its cost billions of dollars over budget and pushed its opening back indefinitely.
abstract: Berlin Journal; Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport is attracting tourists after series of delays and bungles have driven its cost billions of dollars over budget and pushed its opening back indefinitely; part of the appeal seems to be the chance to gawk at evidence that Germany, practically synonymous with precision and efficiency, could fail in such a spectacular fashion.
lead_paragraph: Berlin’s new airport is attracting tourists after a series of delays and bungles have driven its cost billions of dollars over budget and pushed its opening back indefinitely.

headline.seo: Berlin’s Over-Budget, Behind-Schedule Airport Becomes an Attraction
headline.main: In a Land of On-Time Arrivals, a Tour of Anything But
headline.print_headline: In a Land of On-Time Arrivals, a Tour of Anything but
